data.lyric:
[ti:I GUESS I'M IN LOVE]
[ar:Clinton Kane]
[al:I GUESS I'M IN LOVE]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I GUESS I'M IN LOVE - Clinton Kane
[00:00.29]Lyrics by：Clinton Kane/Steve Rusch
[00:00.55]Composed by：Clinton Kane/Steve Rusch
[00:00.80]Oh I'm obsessed
[00:01.61]
[00:04.10]With the way your head is laying on my chest
[00:08.33]
[00:10.04]How you love the things I hate about myself
[00:13.98]And no one knows but with you I see hope again
[00:19.74]
[00:24.32]Oh I'm a mess
[00:25.65]
[00:27.83]When I overthink the little things in my head
[00:31.87]
[00:33.82]You seem to always help me catch my breath
[00:37.65]But then I lose it again when I look at you that's the end
[00:43.45]
[00:48.20]And why do I get so nervous when I look into your eyes
[00:54.22]Butterflies can't stop me falling for you
[00:58.66]
[00:59.89]And darling this is more than anything I felt before
[01:04.96]You're everything that I want but I didn't think I'd find
[01:12.94]Someone who is worth the wait of all the years of my heartbreak
[01:18.44]But I know now I found the one I love
[01:24.72]
[01:29.33]And I love the way
[01:33.07]You can never find the right things to say
[01:37.08]
[01:38.98]And you can't sit still an hour in the day
[01:43.00]I'm so in love let's run away because us is enough
[01:48.63]
[01:53.32]And why do I get so nervous when I look into your eyes
[01:59.31]And butterflies can't stop me falling for you
[02:03.78]
[02:05.19]And darling this is more than anything I felt before
[02:10.14]You're everything that I want but I didn't think I'd find
[02:17.92]Someone who is worth the wait of all the years of my heartbreak
[02:23.48]But I know now I found the one
[02:29.17]
[02:29.89]Come close let me be home for anything
[02:41.42]Good or bad I know it's worth it
[02:49.67]
[02:52.75]And darling this is more than anything I felt before
[02:57.15]
[02:57.69]You're everything that I want but I didn't think I'd find
[03:05.42]Someone who is worth the wait of all the years of my heartbreak
[03:11.02]But I know now I found the one I love
data.trans:
[ti:I GUESS I'M IN LOVE]
[ar:Clinton Kane]
[al:I GUESS I'M IN LOVE]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.29]//
[00:00.55]//
[00:00.80]我沉迷其间
[00:01.61]
[00:04.10]你把头埋在了我的胸口
[00:08.33]
[00:10.04]那些让我仇恨自己的缺点 你怎会如此喜欢
[00:13.98]没有人知道答案 但是有了你 我的希望重燃
[00:19.74]
[00:24.32]我现在一团糟
[00:25.65]
[00:27.83]总是在脑海中翻来覆去地 纠结那些琐碎小事
[00:31.87]
[00:33.82]你似乎总能拯救我 让我可以喘息
[00:37.65]但是眼睛向你望去 我又会屏住呼吸 我已无药可救
[00:43.45]
[00:48.20]为何与你四目相对的时候 我会如此紧张
[00:54.22]内心小鹿乱撞 情不自禁地为你坠入爱河
[00:58.66]
[00:59.89]亲爱的 这感觉前所未有的强烈
[01:04.96]你是我想要的所有 但我不曾想过我真的能遇到
[01:12.94]一个值得我多年心碎等待的人
[01:18.44]但我现在知道 我找到了我一生所爱
[01:24.72]
[01:29.33]我喜欢这样的感觉
[01:33.07]你永远不知道说什么样的话最合适
[01:37.08]
[01:38.98]一整天你连一个小时都坐不住
[01:43.00]我完全陷入了爱中 让我们一起私奔 因为有彼此就足够
[01:48.63]
[01:53.32]为何与你四目相对的时候 我会如此紧张
[01:59.31]内心小鹿乱撞 情不自禁地为你坠入爱河
[02:03.78]
[02:05.19]亲爱的 这感觉前所未有的强烈
[02:10.14]你是我想要的所有 但我不曾想过我真的能遇到
[02:17.92]一个值得我多年心碎等待的人
[02:23.48]但我现在知道 我找到了我一生所爱
[02:29.17]
[02:29.89]靠近一些 让我接纳你的一切
[02:41.42]无论好坏 我知道这都值得
[02:49.67]
[02:52.75]亲爱的 这感觉前所未有的强烈
[02:57.15]
[02:57.69]你是我想要的所有 但我不曾想过我真的能遇到
[03:05.42]一个值得我多年心碎等待的人
[03:11.02]但我现在知道 我找到了我一生所爱
